free: #e Nice to see you.
#c 你好。
#n mihumisang可以是「你好」、「再見」，是郡群任何時候打招呼都可以使用的話。
#e I am going to talk about the legends of the ancestors again.
#c 我要再一次講關於祖先的傳說故事
#n muhna 接下來，再來。muhna-ang 重來！(again-IMP) 。muhna-ang maisin minsuma tantungu 希望下次再來。lahaib 也可以是人經過
#e One day, there is a child. He kept a dog.
#c 有一天有一個小孩，他養了狗。
#n tas < tasa，tas tu hanian < tasa tu hanian。maza 那些或那個的意思。tacini uvaaz 一個孩子
#e Then he caught a frog and put it into a bottle.
#c 然後呢，他抓起一隻青蛙放進他的瓶子裡。
#n madamu 抓，通常用在抓動物的那個動作
#e He was always happy, playing with the frog he caught in the bottle.
#c 他每天很快樂地玩賞那隻他抓來放在瓶子裡的青蛙。
#n mashailang saikin bintuhan 我玩賞星星。ashailangun 玩具。ashailangun ku sisiuh 我玩賞青蛙
#e One night he was going to sleep.
#c 有一晚他要睡覺。
#n masial tu a<i>sabah-an 一覺好眠
#e He thought since he had put the frog into the bottle,
#c 他心想反正他已經把青蛙放在瓶子裡面了。
#e He would enjoyed the frog every day.
#c 然後每天玩賞那隻青蛙。
#e Then he slept with his dog held in his arms.
#c 然後他睡覺時會抱著他的狗。
#n siza maluspingaz cia 娶那個女生。siza 應該是Agent Focus，屬於零型。izaun maluspingaz a 那個女生被娶了；嫁了。mapasiza tu hanian 嫁聚的日子。mapasiza Tahail mas Tanis
#e He also let [his dog] to sleep in the bed.
#c 他也讓牠睡在他的床上。
#e These two were on the bed together.
#c 兩個一起在床上。
#e The kid thought that the frog was put into the bottle.
#c 小孩子認為那個青蛙已經放在瓶子裡面。
#e Then they fell asleep.
#c 然後他們睡著了。
#e All of a sudden the kid woke up, and immediately he checked if the frog is in the bottle.
#c 那個小孩突然醒來，立刻往他的瓶子裡看青蛙是否在裡面。
#e He was shocked, “Why did the frog I caught disappear?”
#c 他嚇了一跳，為什麼我所抓的青蛙不見了？
#n 35. 驚訝的語氣詞。aitu < iatu，本來是viatu或maviatu，「為何」。mavia tu 都會一起講
#e The dog also stood up and looked. ‘Alas, it truly disappeared.’
#c 連狗也站起來看，（心想）「哎呀，真的不見了。」
#e He got out of bed right away and looked for the frog he fostered in the bottle.
#c 他馬上下床找他養在瓶子裡的青蛙。
#n 42. 講錯了。ingadah pan 較完整
#e He also sifted through his slippers and shoes.
#c 他也把他的拖鞋、鞋子翻遍了。
#n sapil 任何的鞋類。suhaz 翻（書、頁、箱子）。musuhazsuhaz 睡不著，翻來覆去
#e Maybe the frog just went inside the shoes?
#c 會不會青蛙就進到那裡面呢？
#e Alas, no.
#c 唉，沒有
#e Then that dog also helped to look for the frog.
#c 然後那隻狗也起來幫忙找（青蛙）。
#e The dog got its head stuck in the bottle, smelling around and looking for where the frog was.
#c 狗不知不覺把牠的頭塞進瓶子裡，還一直聞，想找出青蛙到底在哪裡。
#n kap 應該是 ka，被後面的pungadahun影響了
#e Crap! The bottle cannot be removed from the dog’s head.
#c 糟糕！瓶子沒辦法從頭上拿掉了。
#n 59. 糟了、不妙的語氣詞
#e The dog got its head stuck inside the bottle.
#c （那隻狗的頭）就進到瓶子裡了。
#e The dog put its head inside the bottle and could not get it out.
#c 狗的頭進到瓶子裡面後，拔不出來了。
#n itu asu bungu < itu asu tu bungu 狗的頭
#e The kid was also shocked and said “What am I going to do?”
#c 唉唷，小孩也嚇到，說：「啊呀，這樣要怎麼辦？」
#n 69. 語氣詞，糟糕的意思
#e Then the kid thought it is impossible to remove the bottle stuck to the dog’s neck.
#c 然後，那個孩子覺得拿不掉那個卡在狗的脖子上的瓶子。
#n 72. cin 是口誤。cinliskin 突然想到。miliskin 思考；想念。iniliskinan 曾經所想的東西。a-sia < adii sia 在那裡
#e He thought he was going to drop the dog.
#c 他想他要讓狗掉下去。
#e Drop it. Then, once the dog drops, the bottle is going to be broken.
#c 讓牠掉落，然後，狗掉下去的話，瓶子就會破碎了。
#e Wow! Really!
#c 欸，真的！

gloss: 使役-沿著-處格.近距-受焦
free: #e He dropped the dog from the window like that.
#c 他就這樣從窗戶把他丟下去。
#n mahal < mahalhal

gloss: 主焦-前進-外面=改變狀態
free: #e After dropping it, the bottle really broke, and the dog’s head got out.
#c 丟下去之後，果然瓶子就破了，那個狗的頭出現了！
#e That kid was happy and he hugged the dog.
#c 那個孩子很高興，把那隻狗抱起來。
#e Thank God the bottle was removed! Really!
#c 真是謝天謝地，瓶子掉下來了！
#e Then the dawn breaks. They go to the mountains.
#c 然後天亮了，他們去山上。
#n 93. 常見的發語詞
#e He yells and looks for his frog.
#c 他邊喊邊找他的青蛙。
#e “where are you, frog?”
#c 「青蛙，你在哪裡？」
#e “Why did you run away, why did you run away?”
#c 「為什麼跑掉，為什麼要跑掉？」
#n viatu < maviatu，為什麼
#e The dog is also looking for the frog, barking “Where are you, frog?”
#c 連那隻狗也是一直汪汪叫著跟著找說：「青蛙你在哪裡？」
#e When they are under the tree in the mountain, yelling and looking for the frog, they see a super big hornet hive hanging from the tree.
#c 當他們在山頂的樹下，一直喊叫尋找的時候，他們看到有一個非常大的虎頭蜂窩掛在樹上。
#e Then, they keep yelling.
#c 然後他們一直叫。
#e Then, the dog sees a suspended hornet hive.
#c 然後，狗看到一個掛著的虎頭蜂窩。
#n bahusaz a 指之前提到的蜂窩

gloss: 可見.遠距-那裡=遠距.主格

free: #e The dog thinks about climbing up to the tree, and keeps shaking the hornet hive.
#c 狗就想起要攀爬到樹上去，一直搖晃樹上的虎頭蜂窩。
#e It wonders if the frog is in it, thinks “Did you take our frog away?”
#c 牠想知道青蛙是不是在裡面，想著「是不是你們抓走了我們的青蛙？」
#n inam sisiuh a sinaipuk a 也可以。inam sinaipuk tu sisiuh。*sinaipuk a tu sisiuh
#e Then the kid looks inside the hole on the ground.
#c 然後，那孩子看地上的洞裡面。
#e He keeps yelling toward the hole “Frog, are you in there? Who are you in there? Did you steal my frog?”
#c 他對著那個洞一直叫：「青蛙，你是否在裡面？你們誰在裡面啊，你們是否偷走了我的青蛙？」
#n 那狗在洞裡一直叫 ingadah asu sia laak cia malala’la
#e That kid is shocked. “Oops!”
#c 那個孩子嚇到「哎唷！」
#n cinghuza < tinghuza
#e A rat comes out from the cave.
#c 有一隻老鼠從洞裡出現。
#e The rat goes out and says “What is so noisy and keeps on yelling!”
#c 老鼠跑出來說：「是什麼怎麼吵啊？還一直在叫！」
#n mabis < mazbis < mazbin mas， 「到底什麼啊」的語氣
#e The kid is startled too.
#c 連小孩也嚇到了。
#e Then that dog goes up.
#c 然後，那隻狗他爬上去。
#e It keeps shaking the tree.
#c 牠一直搖晃那棟樹。
#e There is a hornet hive hanging.
#c 有一個掛在上面的虎頭蜂窩。
#e The hive falls down.
#c 不知不覺，那個虎頭蜂（窩）就掉下來。
#e Oops! So many hornets, all of them buzz and show up, chasing after them, biting them.
#c 哎唷，好多的虎頭蜂全部一起嗡嗡地出現，追咬著他們。
#n 156. 這段是口誤
#e Then that kid hides in, on the tree.
#c 然後那個孩子躲到裡面，躲到樹上。
#n tung- < tunghabin，這裡有快速跑進去的意思。
#e He hides on the branches. What should he do if being chased by hornets.
#c 他躲到樹枝上，萬一被虎頭蜂追他要怎麼辦。
#e Then that dog hides away, runs away.
#c 然後那個狗，躲起來，逃跑了。
#n mikui 有可是、雖然的意思。maci-有一種動態的感覺，用力的感覺。malmananu 努力，認真的感覺
#e Although the dog runs away with all-out effort, it is chased by the hornets.
#c 雖然那個狗用盡全力地跑了，還是被虎頭蜂追趕。

gloss: 躲藏-到-裡面-上面=知識詞
free: #n tung-na-nga-daza 是口誤，應該是 tung-na-daza
#e Then when the kid hides on the tree, it turns out there is a hole there.
#c 然後說是當那個小孩子躲在樹上時，（他發現）樹枝有洞。
#e Oops! There turns out to be a huge eagle there.
#c 原來樹洞裡面有隻大老鷹。
#e An eagle all of a sudden shows up, that sees the kid and wants to catch him.
#c 老鷹也突然出現，看到那個小孩，要抓那個小孩。
#e The kid is shocked, dropping onto the root of the tree.
#c 那個小孩嚇得摔下來了，掉到地上的樹根。
#n lana-ngadah laak 掉到洞裡。lananisnis 降低；降落。
#e Then the kid hides (and thinks about) “What on earth should I do? I am going to be pecked by the eagle”
#c 然後，那孩子躲起來，（心想：）「哎唷！要怎麼辦呢？我要被那隻老鷹啄了！」
#e He holds his head (and think) “What should I do? My head will be pecked!”
#c 他抱著頭，心想：「哎唷要怎麼辦？頭要被噣了。」
#e He seems to see a huge rock.
#c 他好像看到一顆大岩石。
#e He climbs up and hides there, without knowing it is a huge deer.
#c 他爬上去躲藏，不知道那原來是隻巨大的鹿。
#e Then he gets onto the deer’s head, seizing antlers tightly.
#c 接著，他就爬上鹿的頭，緊緊握住鹿角。
#e He yells “Who are you? Where are you? Do you know the frog?” Then, at the same time his dog hides too.
#c 他大叫著：「你們是誰？你們在哪裡？看過那個青蛙嗎？」接著，他的狗同時也躲起來。
#n sasu tu < musasu tu。tunghabin=in 躲起來了
#e He yells and looks for (the frog).
#c 他邊叫邊找（青蛙）。
#e He is on there, and he does not know what he rides on is a huge deer.
#c 他在上面，他不知道他搭的，原來是那麼大的鹿。
#e All of a sudden the deer stands up, carrying the kid across its shoulders and antlers.
#c 鹿突然站起來，用肩扛著孩子，扛在角上。
#n maza-sain hai itu ngabul tu vaha 這個是水鹿的角，看得到的。maz=in laupaku isuu iskuzakuza 你現在在作什麼？218. ‘an-vakang 。‘an- 有出力的感覺。cibasisi 披（在肩上）。
#e That deer keep running.
#c 那個鹿一直跑。
#n 用長音表示用力的跑
#e The kid falls into a big river in the valley.
#c 孩子被丟在深谷大河的流裡面。
#e That kid falls into river of the valley.
#c 那個孩子就這樣掉進深谷的河流裡。
#e The dog also falls.
#c 狗也掉下去了。
#e They fall into the river of the valley.
#c 他們掉到山谷的河流裡。
#e Oops! That kid sees they drops into the water.
#c 哎唷，那個小孩看到他們掉到水裡。
#e The kid thinks about what he should do if the dog is flushed away.
#c 小孩心想要是狗被沖走的話怎麼辦。
#n unghanu-an 漂流的地方
#e A bright idea suddenly occurs to him, he thinks about carrying the dog across his shoulders.
#c 他靈機一動，思考著把狗扛在他的肩膀。
#n ‘an-sain-un=ku (sia) baial tu lisav=cia danum=a 我用臉盆裝水。
#e Then they go along with the river flow.
#c 然後他們順流而下。
#e They see a big trunk existing.
#c 他們看到有個很大的樹頭。
#n tuh-nu 莖頭，竹子的第一節莖的地方。tuhu 屁股。matuktuk lukis 砍木。mapaluh lukis 砍伐。bilit-bilit 木頭動的聲音。
#e He thinks “We should get over there, and hide behind the trunk.”
#c 他想：「我們要到那邊去，用那個樹幹躲起來。」
#n sikadang 躲靠
#n 噓的聲音
#e Then he tells the dog “Shh! Keep quiet!”
#c 他對那隻狗說：「噓，別出聲。」
#e They seem to hear frogs calling under the wood.
#c 他們好像聽到有青蛙在木頭下面叫。
#n u-taza-an < u-ta’aza-an
#e Then they go up and see. The dog also gets onto the wood.
#c 然後他們上去看。那隻狗也到木頭上去。
#e They look down from the top.
#c 他們從上往下看。
#n 族語的原意是「他們到了上面後看了看」。
#e Aw! They can truly see a couple of frogs, frog father and frog mother.
#c 哇，他們真的看到，有一對青蛙，那個青蛙的爸爸和媽媽。
#e They keep calling and singing wonderfully.
#c 他們一直叫，悅耳的唱歌。
#n isling 音樂。aiza itu bunun siduh a makitvaivi tu isling tupaun tu pasibutbut 有布農族的特別音樂叫八部合音。makitvaivi與眾不同。
#e They look from the wood. The kid and the dog find out there are tons of the frog’s siblings around the frog parents.
#c 他們從樹頭上看著，小孩子和狗看（青蛙）爸爸媽媽那邊，發現原來有那麼多兄弟姊妹啊！
#n minadaza uvaaz=a mas asu=cia 孩子和狗從樹上。sadu uvaaz=a mas asu=cia 孩子在看狗。272. uvaaz=a mas asu=cia hai isia pasnanava-an。272. ?isian uvaaz=a mas asu=cia sia pasnanava-an=cia。275. 這裡的延長，有一種出乎意料的意思。
#e They keep looking around, finding out the frog they caught is just there!
#c 他們一直看著，他抓的那隻小青蛙原來在那邊。
#n 277. 這邊的延長，有一直盯著看的感覺。av-an-dii av-的前綴有一種原來在這裡的感覺。
#e It turns out to be its son.
#c 原來是他的孩子。
#e He has so many siblings living together.
#c 他住一起的兄弟姊妹好多！
#e Those frogs are singing happily there.
#c 那些青蛙在那邊很高興地一直呱呱地唱著歌。
#e After hearing them finish singing, the kid catches the runaway frog he kept before.
#c 他們聽到他們唱完後，那個孩子就去抓那隻他曾經養過但跑掉的青蛙。

gloss: 非實現=使役-在-好-受焦=1SG.屬格

free: #e Then, he says to the frog family “Don’t be sad! I am going to take your child and raise it well in my home anyway.”
#c 然後，他跟青蛙家族說：「別難過，總之我要把小青蛙帶走，把他好好的養在我家。」
#n asu tu is’ang 指人不好（像狗一樣的心）
#e I will make it a good living place.
#c 我會幫他打造個美好的家。
#e Then they leave, they wish one another all good.
#c 然後他們就這樣彼此祝福，互相分開。
#n palavaz-an 岔路。min-vaaz 分家。min-palavaaz 分成兩列。‘avaz-un 放牧；放出去。ma-‘avaz 放出去
#e That’s it!
#c （故事）就到這裡。
